qa_list.question: What are Shinji Watanabe's research areas?
qa_list.answer: Shinji Watanabe's research areas include Natural Language Processing, Conversational AI, Intelligent Agents and Dialogue, Speech Processing (ASR, Speech Synthesis), Multilingual/Low-Resource Speech Processing, Speech-to-Speech Translation, and Speech Enhancement / Robust Speech Processing.
